ygData.subject: RE: Patch downtime again this morning (Thursday)
ygData.msgSnippet: i tried fufil s also (did not try either tuyen s song) and all i got was 3 ticks of 10dmg and -14 magic resistance.  no change with mistmoore battle drum.
ygData.messageBody:
i tried fufil's also (did not try either tuyen's song) and all i got was 3
ticks of 10dmg and -14 magic resistance. no change with mistmoore battle
drum. from what i remember this is exactly what it was pre-patch. oh well.
along with that and no breastplate a pretty disappointing day.

Oh, I almost forgot too... anyone notice less missed notes? i started,
stopped, and restarted the level 50 song 10 times with no missed notes. i
was only confirming what another 50 bard noticed. that would be impossible
pre-patch, that song missed notes more than not. so one good thing at least

Shada


> From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
> Oh, I almost forgot, I tested fufil's curtailing chant last
> night to see how
> good the improvements were on it and the dang thing was still
> resisted 60%
> of the time when used against blue MOBs so apparently the
> resists were not
> changed on this song. Bummer.
>
> I didn't do any hard number crunching test with it, but it
> did not appear to
> be significantly improved as far as damage goes when sung so
> I switched to
> the drum (normal hand drum, I am not yet among the lucky
> battle bangers) and
> tried it and the damage seemed significant, appeared to do
> around 50 damage
> total over the duration of the DoT (I targeted myself and was
> having much
> lag and PL last night so the results cant be considered very
> accurate but
> only approximate). I'm guessing this is similar to the
> difference between
> singing DD and playing it with a brass horn, night and day as someone
> recently noted.
>
